titles.title: 267 Twas Jesus My Savior (wow nice easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
'Twas Jesus my Savior
Who died on the tree
To open a flountain
For sinners like me
His blood is the fountain
Which pardon bestows
And cleanses the foulest
Wherever it flows

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For the Lion of Judah
Shall break ev'ry chain
And give us the vict'ry
Again and again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And when I was willing
With all things to part
He gave me His blessing
His love in my heart
So now I am join'd with
The conquering band
Who are marching
To glory
At Jesus' command

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though round me the storms
Of adversity roll
And the waves of destruction
Encompass my soul
In vain ths frail vessel
The tempest shall toss
My hope is secure
Through
The blood of the cross

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And when with the ransomed
By Jesus my Head
From fountain to fountain
I then shall be led
I'll fall at His feet
And His mercy adore
And sing Hallelujah
To God evermore
